articles.title: Qualcomm reveals its not-so-elite Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 - The Verge
articles.description: The first Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 phones will come from OnePlus, Motorola, and Vivo within weeks.

articles.title: Destiny 3 in "Extremely Early Development" at Bungie, Leaker Claims - The Game Post
articles.description: A well-known Destiny leaker claims Destiny 3 has entered extremely early development, giving fans hope after years of waiting.

articles.description: Early Black Friday deals are live with big discounts on PS5, Nintendo Switch/Switch 2 and Xbox games, hardware and accessories. Plus Walmart tech bargains, $25 Pokémon plushies and huge streaming service offers.

articles.title: Modder who first put Thomas the Tank Engine into Skyrim flips the bird at the lawyers, does it again in Morrowind: "I fundamentally do not view toy company CEOs or media CEOs as people" - GamesRadar+
articles.description: "I sometimes feel like I need to milk a particular joke until its inevitable demise"
